Package de.tud.android.locpairs

Class Summary
BalloonItemizedOverlay<Item> An abstract extension of ItemizedOverlay for displaying an information balloon upon screen-tap of each marker overlay.
BalloonOverlayView A view representing a MapView marker information balloon.
CardMarkerOverlay Show markers for each room that is used as scan point in a game.
GameInstancesActivity Lobby.
GameInstanceView The Class GameInstanceView.
GameListAdapter The Class GameListAdapter.
GoThereOverlay Shows other team player on the map where to go.
InRoundPlayingActivity InRoundPlayingActivity handles the actions in the active game.
InstructionsActivity Instructions.
LobbyActivity Lobby.
LobbyListAdapter Has a list with all LobbyUsers and their positions.
LobbyUserView The Class LobbyUserView which provides the GUI of the lobby.
LocPairs LocPairs is the central Activity of the game.
PairsBallonItemizedOverlay An abstract extension of BallonItemizedOverlay for displaying the picture information of a scanned card depending on the card position.
PlayersOverlay Shows other players on map with different colors depending on their team.
ScoreActivity Shows the game score of each team and its members at the and of the game.
SettingsActivity This class represents the SettingsActivity.
